content: This makes it a great Gourd for those looking to  risky, when compared to the other Gourds in the game, as the attack boost is quite potent. The Gourd only has five uses and can't be upgraded.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Plaguebane_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Plaguebane Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
This makes it a great Gourd for those looking to  risky, when compared to the other Gourds in the game, as the attack boost is quite potent. The Gourd only has five uses and can't be upgraded.
